rooms.description: Spacious area for family gatherings and entertainment. Includes a modern open-plan design.
Integrated with the kitchen to encourage social interaction during meals.
Modern kitchen equipped with energy-efficient appliances and ample storage. Vastu-compliant layout ensures a connection with nature from one of its windows.
Luxurious master bedroom with ensuite bathroom. Positioned in the south-west zone for optimal rest and privacy.
Well-lit secondary bedroom located towards the north-east zone to enhance positivity and good energy flow.
Functional third bedroom, designed with natural ventilation in mind for overall comfort.
Dedicated space for professional work. Designed as a quiet corner with sound insulation and minimal distractions.

A tranquil library/study room located away from the high-traffic areas to encourage concentration and learning. Vastu guidelines suggest a placement in an east or north zone for intellectual pursuits.

openings.description: Entrance door designed to welcome positive energy and adhere to Vastu principles by avoiding direct alignment with the bedroom or kitchen.
Strategically placed window for ample natural light in the living room and master bedroom areas.
Balcony providing outdoor space with view to garden and natural surroundings.
